thread.section_title: Splash Super Center Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Splash Super Center | www.splashsupercenter.com
thread.title: PatT
thread.title_full: Splash Super Center reviewed by PatT

author: PatT
title: PatT
text: My order was processed and delivered as promised. The cover we purchased replaced an old Loop-lock cover and this one has features that are better - straps are sewn below the cover (the straps on our old Loop-lock separated from the material due to the weight of the snow and ice), and there are reinforced patches that protect the corners of the step area. Very nice quality.
